build.buildCommand: mkdir -p storage/framework/{views,cache,sessions} storage/logs bootstrap/cache && chmod -R 777 storage bootstrap/cache && install-php-extensions zip && composer install --optimize-autoloader --no-scripts --no-interaction

deploy.startCommand: php artisan package:discover --ansi && php artisan config:clear && php artisan cache:clear && php artisan migrate --force && php artisan serve --host=0.0.0.0 --port=${PORT}
